summary: Red Dot Award 2025 winner for bold, ground-breaking design
ATLAS architecture derived from Land Rover D8 platform
HYPAR HUD (first homegrown ICE vehicle with AR display), Horizon View triple-screen cockpit and Theatre Pro in-cabin experience
Level 2+ ADAS suite with 22 functions including Intelligent Speed Assist, Adaptive Steering Assist and Blind Spot View Monitor
Up to 62.2 Litre equivalent boot (VDA) with sliding boss mode, winged comfort headrests and ventilated seats

variants.name: Concept Persona
key_features: PanoramaX voice-controlled sunroof with mood lighting
Horizon View triple-screen infotainment with 31.2 cm passenger display
12-speaker JBL Black system with Dolby Atmos and SonicShaft soundbar
Superglide suspension with Frequency Dependent Damping
6-way powered driver seat with memory, thigh support extender and rear boss mode
safety: 4-wheel disc brakes, electronic parking brake with auto hold
SOS (E-Call/B-Call), iRA connected suite with 75 functions
HypAR HUD projected alerts, 360° SVS with Blind Spot View Monitor
Level 2+ ADAS with AEB (Pedestrian/Vehicle/Cyclist), LKA/LCS, ISA and Door Open Alert
technology: Mappls integrated navigation with digital cockpit projection
Arcade Suite (28+ OTT/gaming apps)
Alexa Connected Car (home-to-car/car-to-home)
Wireless Android Auto/Apple CarPlay with dual device support
65W Type-C fast charging (front & rear) with media passthrough

summary: OMEGARC platform derived from Land Rover D8

Level 2+ ADAS (22 functions) and VisionEX E-IRVM with dual dash cam
Available Hyperion 1.5L Turbo GDI petrol (170 PS/280 Nm) and Kryotec 2.0L diesel (170 PS/350 Nm)
R19 staggered alloys, parametric grille and theatre-inspired interior lighting
